name: Human
description: Adaptable and resourceful people who thrive in diverse environments through ingenuity and determination.

passives.name: Versatile Origins
passives.description: Once per rest, apply one of your Skill Tags to a check even if it wouldn't normally apply.

name: Elf
description: Ancient beings with deep connections to magic and nature, carrying the wisdom of countless generations.

passives.name: Ancestral Memory
passives.description: Once per rest, you can access inherited knowledge to gain a relevant Skill Tag for one roll, even if you don't normally have it.

name: Dwarf
description: Sturdy folk renowned for their craftsmanship, resilience, and deep connection to stone and metal.

passives.name: Stoneblood Resilience
passives.description: Once per rest, ignore the effects of a Condition (Weakened, Dazed, or Stunned) applied to you.

name: Halfling
description: Small, cheerful people who find strength in community, comfort, and shared good fortune.

passives.name: Lucky
passives.description: After a rest, everyone within Near range gains 1 Luck.

name: Orc
description: Powerful warriors driven by passion and strength, living with intensity in all aspects of life.

passives.name: Battle Fury
passives.description: When you take damage, gain +1 to your next attack roll for each point of damage taken (max +3).

name: Construct
description: Artificial beings powered by magic or technology, approaching problems with logic and precision.

passives.name: Analytical Core
passives.description: Once per rest, when you fail a roll involving knowledge or reasoning, immediately make the roll again with a +2 bonus.

name: Fairy
description: Ethereal beings from otherworldly realms, existing partially between the material and spiritual planes.

passives.name: Ephemeral
passives.description: Once per rest, you can become incorporeal until the end of the scene, allowing you to pass through objects and ignore physical damage (but not magical effects).

name: Gnome
description: Clever inventors and scholars who see the world as a puzzle to be solved through ingenuity and craft.

passives.name: Tinker's Insight
passives.description: You can jury-rig temporary solutions. Once per rest, create a makeshift item that functions for one scene before breaking.

name: Beastfolk
description: People who blend humanoid and animal traits, maintaining strong connections to their primal instincts.

passives.name: Adaptive Senses
passives.description: Once per rest, you can enhance one of your senses (sight, hearing, smell, etc.) to gain a +3 bonus on any roll that would benefit from that enhanced perception.

name: Changeling
description: Shapeshifting beings who excel at adaptation and understanding others through their fluid nature.

passives.name: Fluid Identity
passives.description: Once per rest, you can assume a different appearance and mannerisms, gaining a +3 bonus to rolls involving deception or fitting into social situations.
